133.content:
one night Dawn went into the woods to look for fie wood as ash and brock were asleep. while looking she ran into a strange man who said, "hello missy. would you like to purchase something awesome?"
"sure" Dawn replied, "what is it?"
the man took out a strange looking gun. "its a size amplifier. it can make things bigger or smaller."
"cool.how much?"
"10 pokedollars"
Dawn made the purchase, thanked the man, and left. as she made her way back to the others she thought of what to do with it and so decides to test it out on...
133.title: Dawn

1332.content: Dawn grabbed the gun and set it on grow. She pointed on herself and she grew until she's

1551.title: The others / miscellaneous category

1552.content:
The “Originals/Custom” category is just
what it sounds like but will be given
more details....

This category is where
ALL INTERESTED Readers and
writers get to run will so long as they
observe the interactives overall rules plus the
following additional guidance


1 - Please if taking a slot for your own
free-running story leave at least 1 extra
slot for the next writer that might
want/need an open slot then begin your story

2 - While the stories here will be
whatever you want please be mindful of
the rules though as an exception I’ll
allow some rule bending

Case in point giant males will be allowed
if they’re under age 5 and the potty stuff
is kept to a minimum

Other than that not much else here

Just have fun, write those size stories
to your hearts content and let’s get started
1552.title: Originals / Custom - Reader’s choice

155332313.title: More choices

1553323133.content:
The little girl set her sights on Cia.


She took aim at the flat chested Cia
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/66...
And fired.


A red beam fired out and struck Cia in the back.
Cia didn't feel a thing.

The girl stopped firing at Cia when another girl caught her.

"Hey what are you doing kid"

The girl was so startled she dropped the raygun and ran.

The older girl picked up gun and examined it.

"Huh what's this thing" she said pulling the trigger and firing a second blast at Cia.

"Eh? All it's doing is shooting light. This toy of that kids is boring"
With that she stopped firing and tossed it in the trash.


No one noticed Cia grow a few inches taller.

Late...
1553323133.title: Cia

15533233.content:
Based on an interactive that’s just a
revival or retelling of an old interactive
———————

The premise is about a device called
“The Matter Transponder”
Basically a glorified size device

——————-
Let's just say you weren't exactly invited to the science lab at this early hour of the day, but here you are amongst the various tables of equipment and chemicals. You walk on silent toes while perspiration pools in your pores. You're unsure how many people could be in the building already. There were only a handful of cars in the parking lot when you pulled in, but that could easily have increased to pockets full by now.

You know what you are looking for; you've only been following its theory and progress for months on years under Professor Montana. Miss Rebekah Montana, one of the youngest, brightest physics professors in the country, just twenty-five years old, devoted countless hours and years to this project, and you were always thrilled to overhear any information about it. The unbelievable "matter transposer", a device that could alter the size of any object or person it contacted should be here, in this very college laboratory. Through your piecing together of the puzzle, the physics of the invention remained unclear, but every partial hint gave the suggestion that it is real and that it will work. And there it is!

Resembling sketches the professor failed to hide from your observant inspections, the matter transposer rests on a nearby lab table like any other ordinary piece of equipment. How could she leave such a wonder exposed like this! Good fortune or fate, it waits for you, calling you forward. You stand a moment in awe of what the oddly small device could do. Any of your fantasies could be transferred to reality with this simple, size-changing machine.

The matter transposer presents itself as a compact, silvery cylinder with several lights and a miniature display. A round dial gives the impression of controlling the power and direction, while a short handle and trigger creates a pistol-like form factor. You take it into your hands.
15533233.title: Something else

choices: Take it with you to test later

info.brief_description: A massive all over the place Size change or transformation story/interactive! Please Add
info.description:
Similar to Based in part off of and inspired by:

http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1254397-The-Reducer

http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1605646-The-Size-Remote---Tinas-Sto...

http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1308055-The-size-Ray

http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1501276-Teen-with-a-shrinkgrowth--g...
http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/888619-When-Good-Girls-Grow-Big

And other Similar stories.

The following ARE STRONGLY ENCOURAGED

• Size change / macro or micro / GTS

• Gender Change ( Male into female ONLY PLEASE )

• Use of Anime, manga or animation medium characters
or OC’s / custom characters

• Transformation into a pseudo furr NOT FULL ON
Furry ( cat girl/Neko/Fox girl / dog girl / wolf girl )


Rules ARE AS FOLLOWS NO EXCEPTIONS!!! :

1 > ONLY Female Growth/Giantess is allowed unless it falls under an exception below

2 > Anything Sexual Can be Boy/Girl or Girl/Girl ONLY ( I have nothing against boy/boy just not in this story please

3 > I WILL CHOOSE THE ANIME CHOICES TO INSERT YOU MAY THEN CHOOSE ANY CHARACTER(s)
A male character can use a size gun however for reason unexplained it can ONLY Grow Females unless the female uses it on a male for the purpose of doing sexual things.

4 > Size Guns can shrink or grow thus shrinking women is allowable but to be kept at a minimum

5 > NO GROWING OF ANYONE OVER THE AGE OF 22 ANYTHING Ages 2 thru 22 is fine

6 > If a Guy is grown per rule 3 the growth is ONLY Temporary.



7 > THERE ARE NO LIMITS TO HOW BIG THE GIRL CAN GROW ( IN OTHER WORDS ENDLESS GROWTH IS ALLOWED )HOWEVER SHE CANNOT SHRINK SMALLER THAN THAT WHICH THE NAKED HUMAN EYE CAN. FURTHER MORE WHILE TINY OR WHILE ANY SIZE LARGER THAN 50 FEET ( In the giantesses universe/planet of origin's size scales ) She IS 100% Invincible CANNOT DIE BE KILLED OR CRUSHED But can still feel and possibly be injured but will heal EXTREMELY FAST!!


8 > I'll go by the theories in http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/888619-When-Good-Girls-Grow-Big/map... and similar stories/story chapters. IF THE GIANTESS OUTGROWS HER GALAXY/UNIVERSE SHE WILL JUST GROW INTO ANOTHER ONE.


9 > PLEASE KEEP KILLING AS MINIMAL AS POSSIBLE

10 > NO Potty type stuff please

11 > I Reserve the right to edit, add or remove rules or chapters as needed


So enjoy
